original_text: And Jacob told Rachel that he was her father's kinsman, and that he was Rebekah's son, and she ran and told her father.
korean_text: 그에게 자기가 그의 아버지의 생질이요 리브가의 아들 됨을 말하였더니 라헬이 달려가서 그 아버지에게 알리매

sentences.original_text: that he was her father's kinsman
and that he was Rebekah's son
and she ran and told her father
